svg.text: Create Match Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Create Match
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Four-step wizard process for creating sports matches with content moderation,
venue selection, participant management, and automatic ML-powered content screening.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with complete profile
2. User must have sufficient XP or meet hosting requirements
Main Flow:
1. User clicks "Host a Game" from main navigation or dashboard
2. Step 1 - Sport Selection: User selects sport type from available options
3. Step 2 - Match Details: User enters title, description, skill level, duration
4. User sets participant limits (min/max players) and match requirements
5. User specifies date, time, and scheduling preferences
6. Step 3 - Location: User selects venue from available courts/facilities
7. System displays venue details, amenities, and booking information
8. Step 4 - Review: User reviews all match information for accuracy
9. System runs ML content moderation on title and description
10. Content passes auto-approval (87% rate) or queued for manual review
11. System creates match and assigns unique match ID
12. User receives hosting confirmation and match details
13. System awards XP for hosting and updates user statistics
14. Match becomes visible in Find Games with recommendation algorithm
15. System sends notifications to potentially interested users
Alternative Flows:
A1. Content flagged: Match queued for manual admin review before publication
A2. Venue unavailable: System suggests alternative venues or time slots
A3. Validation errors: System highlights incomplete or invalid fields
A4. Save draft: User can save incomplete match as draft for later completion
A5. Cancel creation: User exits wizard with confirmation dialog
